name: Stylish Chateau with a vast Parc at the Loire River
description:
DESCRIPTION
Close to the Loire riverbanks and nestled in the beautiful region of forests and lakes of the Sologne and the vineyards of the Sancerrois , lies this beautiful historical property.
With gorgeous views and romance in bucket loads, this is an outstanding venue to host your wedding.
Best suited to intimate events, the Chateau has been recently renovated to include beautiful interiors and comfortable bedrooms, while retaining its authenticity and charm.
You can choose to have your wedding in the stunning rural grounds, with the backdrop of the Chateau, or opt for an indoor ceremony or wedding breakfast in the romantic reception rooms of the venue.
The Chateau can sleep 18 guests across 9 bedrooms and there are plenty of other accommodation options nearby.
There is a huge brand-new heated swimming pool - perfect for a cocktail party or a pool party the following day.
The vast Chateau parc and terraces offer plenty of room to set up party & food marquees, so if you plan a large reception, it is the perfect place.
You will find freshly renovated bedroom suites with super comfortable boxspring beds, toppers and luxurious bedding. All bedroom suits have their own en-suite state of the art modern bathrooms with walk in showers or own bathtub.
Our own river ( La Notre heure) runs through the vast 22 hectares property and a little dinghy is available for you to use.
Walk one hour without meeting anybody, as the property is all private and secured. You will meet our own wildlife with deer, hogs, squirrels, beavers and a multitude of birds.
We can organize the following equipment to make your event unforgettable:
Furniture
Napoleon III chairs
Buffets, tables and bar tables
Party tents
Parasols
Lighting
Ambient lighting on battery
Candlesticks
Garlands
Animations
Photo booth with integrated printer
Sound system
Bose speakers
Microphones
Mix table,
Turntables
Amplifiers
Photo & video
Standard ACER 3000 lumens video projector – HDMI
120 cm x 170 cm screen
Activities:
Hot-air Ballooning
Magician, DJ, Photobooth
Horse Riding
Golfing
Fishing
We work with a wide range of suppliers, and planners, allowing you a tailor-made organization to meet all of your expectations.
They can help to organize large outdoor events in the 22 ha property of the castle.
Free, secured on-site parking
For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help!
Photo Credit: Saya Photography
additional_info:
